channel.title: Okay so
channel.description:
Serious thread is serious, we have an issue and serious clashes between Davidi2 and myself (nothing new really). So I share Davidi2s view that the server is suffering here so I think we should have a little bit of both worlds, myself and Davidi2 represent the 2 sides of Moparcraft (pvp and builder so we can cater for both this way).
From my understanding:
Davidi2 - Want a building world where people can build and have nice little things while not having to worry about being pvped on. (Minority, do not deny it!)
Tom_BETA - Wants a PVP world (basically W2 except with PVP on) (Majority)
So I propose this, get rid of World 1 and make it into a creative/building world (whatever). I know what Moparisthebest is going to say: No. But I'm going to challenge that view because it's just pointless keeping W1 now and is only damaging the server.
Wanted to post this here before moving it into Moparcraft discussion so the staff team could have a closed discussion on it first.
Let's leave old arguments out of this, I've been saying get rid of W1 for a builder world since the begining of time and I'm sure Davidi2 has as well so it would be stupid to ignore such a beneficial thing.
:) ;) :D :eek: :cool: :rolleyes: :P ;D :) ;) :D

item.title: Okay so
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

We definitely have to wait until 1.0 is out, no reason not to.

I’m thinking it could actually be a real creative world?

Read full topic

item.title: Okay so
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Let’s just get this building world up, so first things that need addressing:

[ul][li]When? Are we waiting for 1.0?[/li][li]Specifications? Just a normal world with mobs on/no pvp?[/li][/ul]

As I said before:

I think no pvp, mobs on, no flying/spawning and just building. So basic vanilla with no pvp.

Read full topic

item.title: Okay so
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Well, isn’t that the way we’ve had it since the start of W2? Seems fair that now it’s the other way around for a while now.

Plus this is the time before an upgrade when nobody really wants to get on because they’d have to downgrade, so there isn’t much to complain about?

Read full topic

item.title: Okay so
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

So can someone just take time and explain why people is disabled instead of enabled? I understand the plugin part and all, but why not the other way around?

Read full topic

item.title: Okay so
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

1.8 is the cause of any lag, extra worlds shouldn’t be the issue.

There doesn’t have to be a cost to get to other worlds, so it would probably be free to go to the creative world.

Read full topic

item.title: Okay so
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

And the server lags with just 2, adding a third has potential to make it even worse, unless you plan on hosting it somewhere else

Read full topic

item.title: Okay so
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

But what will be the cost of using the portals? The cactus idea made it really difficult to get into World 2, I know you said walk a while and find some but people really struggled.

Read full topic

item.title: Okay so
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Then we can spell everything out nicely with signs and such. There isn’t much confusing about simple portals I don’t think.

Read full topic

item.title: Okay so
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I personally think it should be survival but with PVP off (Monsters should stay on).

The only concern I have for tons of worlds is potential confusion.

Read full topic

item.title: Okay so
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Now that we have a multi-world plugin all set up and disabled, adding more is trivial, so I don’t see any reason why we would ever delete or replace a world again.

Should the new world be ‘survival’ but with PVP (and possibly monsters) off, or should it be ‘creative’ so anyone could fly and have unlimited items etc etc etc?

Read full topic

item.title: Okay so
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

That’s what I was suggesting, but getting rid of W1 and replacing it. Don’t you think five worlds is a little much?

Also, Christmas bulbasaur woooooo

Read full topic

item.title: Okay so
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Wouldn’t another ‘creative’ type world solve all these problems? (obviously pvp would be off in the creative world, and it would probably be ‘peaceful’ (no monsters))

Read full topic

item.title: Okay so
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Actually, why do we need two worlds simply because of two different types of players? It’s ridiculous. We shouldn’t have to justify our actions to one another.

Read full topic

item.title: Okay so
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Considering there isn’t one set strategy, nope, it doesn’t. Badger41 had six guys, you’re correct BUT he also had a tower for them all to shoot from. If they were out in the open then they would have been vulnerable, they also had 7 dogs and unreasonable amounts of TNT.

Dogs are a brilliant defensive mechanism!

Read full topic

item.title: Okay so
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

No, you had to retreat because there were like 6 of them (I know because I’ve seen all of them together). Your guy’s whole strategy revolves around them not knowing you are there, so don’t try to twist it around and pretend that the defenses matter at all. You guys get through them before they know you are there, and kill them when they are not ready. Badger had a chance because he had friends with him.

Read full topic

item.title: Okay so
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

That’s why I suggested another world for the people who feel threatened to go to, there is hardly an imbalance either it’s not difficult to defend yourself against incoming attackers it just requires a little effort, if everyone did this then there would be no imbalance.

Take Badger41 and his crew for example, I bit of more than I could chew the first time I attacked him and completely underestimated his compounds defenses, he almost ended up killing me (I had to retreat) he is an example of an organized builder, someone who caters for both worlds.

In reality, the defenders do have the upper hand, not the attackers. If done correctly the defenders will clear the floor of the attackers (Moparisthebests fortress is another prime example of an organized builder).

Read full topic

item.title: Okay so
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Your superior strength is that the person doesn’t know you are coming to kill them, and you’re forcing them to give you their items.

But here’s a wikipedia definition:

Bullying is a form of aggressive behavior manifested by the use of force or coercion to affect others, particularly when the behavior is habitual and involves an imbalance of power. It can include verbal harassment, physical assault or coercion and may be directed repeatedly towards particular victims
Fits right in really. 'Aggressive behavior', 'affects others', 'habitual', 'physical assault' etc.

But really the point isn’t weather or not you are bullying, I’m just saying that’s what people like myself, that prefer the sandbox side of Minecraft, hate about the server, and why they all left.

Read full topic

item.title: Okay so
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I shall review this.

Bulying: Use superior strength or influence to intimidate (someone), typically to force him or her to do what one wants.

Firstly, we don’t PVP to force someone to do it we PVP because it’s fun and because it’s very profitable. Who says I have superior strength over these people? Every single person on this server started in the same place I did, it’s a level playing field so there is no reason why these builders can’t use their logic and avoid being subject to PVP.

Bullying is a hard thing to get out of (typically), this isn’t the case here. This is why I’m all for the night plugin, it’s a bit of both worlds, but the changing of the PVP completely (turning it off despite it being on for long periods of time) was uncalled for.

Read full topic

item.title: Okay so
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:5, topic:424115”]what is fun is secretly organizing against others :|[/quote]And this is why the builders hate your type of PvP, you organize against people that don’t want to PvP, and it’s quite simply: bullying

If you guys stopped that, I’m sure others along with myself wouldn’t mind normal PvP.

Read full topic

item.title: Okay so
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

World 2 without PVP just isn’t fun, I can’t cope anymore and it’s only been a few days as well. Everything I’ve built is with PVP in mind, everything I have is based on PVP and I’m sure many others have the same issue (I’m sure you read my post outlining that most the PVP base were bored when PVP was off in it’s natural form and so resort to burning people and finding new ways of killing them instead).

A faction plugin would be a joke anyway, that’s just not fun, what is fun is secretly organizing against others

I’ll never compromise for no original PVP at all, even if it’s at night only. But no PVP is no fun, I’m not talking about a pvp plugin or anything I’m talking about original PVP.

Read full topic

item.title: Okay so
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

That’s what W2 was supposed to be, if I remember correctly. :o But someone proposed PvP at night, and then the plugin never worked so it was on all the time, and then X lead to Y and everyone left.

Though I hate splitting the population like that… but I guess it’s ok for now. I still think we should find a faction plugin for that world, because PvP in that way was fun. Just leave PvP off until we find it this time please hehe.

Read full topic

item.title: Okay so
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I propose:

Scrap W1 and put it up for download, then replace W1 with a builder world that can be designed by the servers players (Like W2 was). Then just keep W2 the same but with PVP on.

All we need to do is persuade Moparisthebest to change W1, this should be interesting

Also, just realized I sound quite angry when I post it isn’t intentional, I’ll add smiley faces from now on like Davidi2/Moparisthebest do

Read full topic

item.title: Okay so
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I don’t necessarily want PvP off, it’s just not the same as what we used to do which was fun.

[quote=“Davidi2, post:30, topic:424036”]Point is, the most popular days of the server was when you could build freely without the fear of PvP when you didn’t want to. At the time, if I remember correctly, there were still organized raids between factions and those were fun. But it wasn’t the shit you [i]guys/i do now, where you sneak up on someone and kill them for their stuff or to ‘punish’ them for being annoying or whatever.[/quote]Basically that. It was fun to begin with but you guys ruined it and scared everyone away

So yea, unless we can get that back, I want PvP off.

Read full topic

item.description:

Serious thread is serious, we have an issue and serious clashes between Davidi2 and myself (nothing new really). So I share Davidi2s view that the server is suffering here so I think we should have a little bit of both worlds, myself and Davidi2 represent the 2 sides of Moparcraft (pvp and builder so we can cater for both this way).
